definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: In powder form, there were large amount of inulins and non-glandular hairs.
sentences.chinese: 粉末中可見大量菊糖及非腺毛。

sentences.english: Long handle trichomes were the principal type on the leaf surface of burley tobacco.
sentences.chinese: 長柄腺毛是白肋菸葉片上腺毛的主要類型。

sentences.english: Long handle trichomes were the principal type on the leaf surface of burley tobacco.
sentences.chinese: 長柄腺毛是白肋菸葉片上腺毛的主要類型。

sentences.english: Stipule and the rachis base gather live, the edge bamboo splint dentate fission, has the glandular hair .
sentences.chinese: 托葉與葉軸基部合生，邊緣篾齒狀分裂，有腺毛。

sentences.english: And the hair cells on the shoot tip and the embryo had the structural features secretory cells had.
sentences.chinese: 莖尖和胚的腺毛還具有分泌細胞的結構特徵。

sentences.english: The effect of glandular trichomes may depend on the nature of the exudate .
sentences.chinese: 具腺毛狀體的影響依賴於分泌物的性質。

sentences.english: The density of trichome was stable in two years, and largely determined by genes.
sentences.chinese: 腺毛密度年際間比較穩定，受基因影響大。
